DOC.brief_summary: The aim dispense study evaluate clinical performance habitual wearer enfilcon A lens follow refit fanfilcon A lenses 4 week daily wear .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Performance Existing Wearers Enfilcon A Following Refit With Fanfilcon A Lenses 4 Weeks
DOC.detailed_description: This 30 subject , prospective , dispense , bilateral wear , subject-masked study , review refit characteristic group enfilcon A wearer switch fanfilcon A lens . Subject 's habitual enfilcon A lenses evaluate first vist re-fitted pair fanfilcon A lenses 4 week daily wear . After dispense visit , subject return evaluation 1 week , 2 week , 4 week .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion A person eligible inclusion study he/she : Is 18 40 year age Has selfreported visual exam last two year Is adapt enfilcon A contact lens wearer ( least 2 week enfilcon A lens ) Has contact lens spherical prescription 1.00 6.00 Has spectacle cylinder 0.75D ( Diopters ) eye . Can achieve best correct spectacle distance visual acuity 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) good eye . Can achieve distance visual acuity 20/30 ( 0.18 logMAR ) good eye study contact lens . Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has read , understood , sign information consent letter . Patient contact lens refraction fit within available parameter study lens . Is willing comply wear schedule ( least 5 day per week , > 8 hours/day assume contraindication ) . Is willing comply visit schedule Exclusion Criteria A person exclude study he/she : Is habitual wearer enfilcon A lenses Has CL ( Contact Lens ) prescription outside range available parameter study lens . Has spectacle cylinder â‰¥1.00D cylinder either eye . Has history achieve comfortable CL wear ( 5 day per week ; > 8 hours/day ) Has contact lens best correct distance vision bad 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) either eye . Presence clinically significant ( grade 34 ) anterior segment abnormality Presence ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : Pathological dry eye associate finding Pterygium , pinguecula , corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization > 0.75 mm limbus Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GCP ) bad grade 1 Anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) Seborrheic eczema , Seborrheic conjunctivitis History corneal ulcer fungal infection Poor personal hygiene Has know history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) Has aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea . Has Presbyopia dependence spectacle near work contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is participate type eye related clinical research study .
